story.storykicker: The University of Calcutta has released an admission notification, inviting applications from interested, eligible candidates to apply for its Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D) programme in the Department of Home Science. The last date for the submission of an application form is June 20.
story.storybody:
The University of Calcutta has released an admission notification, inviting applications from interested, eligible candidates to apply for its Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D) programme in the Department of Home Science for the commencing academic session 2016.

Vacancies

Home Science (Food and Nutrition): 9

Home Science (Human Development): 3

Eligibility criteria

Educational qualification:

Ph.D. in Food and Nutrition: Those interested in applying for this programme must have done M.Sc in food and nutrition or equivalent degree from a recognised university with a minimum of 55 per cent marks in M.Sc for general candidates and minimum 50 per cent marks in M.Sc for the SC/ ST/ OBC/ physically handicapped candidates.

Ph.D in Human Development: Those interested in applying for this programme must have done M.A /M.Sc. in human development or equivalent degree from a recognised university with a minimum of 55 per cent marks in M.A /M.Sc for general candidates and a minimum 50 per cent marks in M.A/ M.Sc for the SC/ ST/ OBC/ physically handicapped candidates.

Selection procedure:

A written test or an interview will be conducted for shortlisting and final selection of the candidates.

How to apply:

The candidates are required to download the application form from the official website. They are then required to send the filed in forms along with all other relevant documents to ' The Department of Home Science, University of Calcutta, Viharilal College Campus, 20 B Judges' Court Road, Alipore, Kolkata 700027'.

Important dates:

The last date for the submission of an application form is June 20.

The list of candidates eligible for an admission test will be released on June 24.

The admission test will be conducted on July 12.

The list of candidates eligible for the interview will be released on July 19.

The interview will be held on July 26.

Read: MGM Institute of Health Sciences admissions 2016: Apply for B.Sc/M.Sc courses

For information on more courses and admissions, click here
